name: SoundReply-CustomResponsesforyourRoutines
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound reply
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you want to add sound effects to your routines?

Now you can with Sound Reply. It's super easy to create a custom response.

*** STEP 1 ***

Visit:
www.soundreply.net 

*** STEP 2 ***

Simply upload or record a sound.

*** STEP 3 ***

Copy the provided text and use it in the custom action phrase of your routine.

Now, whenever the routine runs, the audio will play as the last action in the routine.

Supports media such as MP3s, Wav and more.

Support:
Email info@topvoiceapps.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
